variables.description: The name of the Amazon Redshift security group that will be associated with the ingress                   rule.
variables.name: ClusterSecurityGroupName

variables.description: The IP address range that has inbound access to the Amazon Redshift security group.
variables.name: CIDRIP

variables.description: The Amazon EC2 security group that will be added the Amazon Redshift security group.
variables.name: EC2SecurityGroupName

variables.description: The 12-digit AWS account number of the owner of the Amazon EC2 security group that                   is specified by the EC2SecurityGroupName parameter.
variables.name: EC2SecurityGroupOwnerId
variables.required: Conditional. If you specify the EC2SecurityGroupName                   property, you must specify this property.
